name: FF Ganon
author: Alucard648
info: Expanded and un-hardcoded variant of Z1 ganon. and reworked Ganon Room sequence.
description: Expanded and un-hardcoded variant of Z1 ganon. Teleports around, firing eweapons at Link, if brought down to 0 HP, Link needs to hit him one last time with specific lweapon to finish off, otherwise boss fully recovers.
setup: Upon compiling, assign 2 FFC script slots//Enemy - FF GanonUses 2 rows of tiles, one below anotherAttribute 1: Duration for near death state, in framesAttribute 2: ID of lweapon needed to finish off GanonAttribute 3: Tile WidthAttribute 4: Tile HeightAttribute 5: Minimum damage of lweapon needed to finish off GanonAttribute 6: CSet used for near death stateAttribute 7: Invisibility: 0 - none, 1 - visible only to Lens of Truth, 2 - completely invisibleAttribute 8: Delay between teleporting, in framesAttribute 9: Eweapon spriteAttribute 10: Tntroduction sequence duration, in frames//FFC Script - Ganon Room sequenceNear perfect recreation of default ZC Ganon Room sequence, like Link holding Triforce, boss dropping stuff on death etc.Place anywhere in the screen. D0 - ID of boss NPC D1 - Tile used for rendering Link holding Triforce at intro D2 - Tile used for rendering Triforce at intro D3 - ID of item dropped by boss, when killed
